generated_body: In the article titled "Republicans attempt to move impeachment inquiry away from Trump," the user may expect to read about the latest developments regarding the impeachment inquiry involving former President Trump and the Republican Party's strategic efforts to shift focus away from him. Additionally, it could provide insights into how this shift might impact public perception and the broader political landscape, although the specifics of these impacts remain uncertain.
